HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Orders from 299 Kč to 598 Kč: 79 Kč. Orders from 599 Kč to 799 Kč: 59 Kč. Orders from 799 Kč: FREE.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Orders with a weight higher than 31 kg will be sent in two or more packages. A service fee may be charged for these additional shipping costs. The exact fee is not specified.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: PPL Parcelshop: Orders from 299 Kč to 598 Kč - 69 Kč; Orders from 599 Kč to 799 Kč - 59 Kč; Orders from 799 Kč - FREE. Zásilkovna (up to 15kg): Orders from 299 Kč to 598 Kč - 49 Kč; Orders from 599 Kč to 799 Kč - 39 Kč; Orders from 799 Kč - FREE.
PARCEL_SHOPS.cod_surcharge: Not available for Zásilkovna. Not explicitly mentioned for PPL Parcelshop.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: AlzaBox, PPL Parcelbox: Orders from 299 Kč to 598 Kč - 69 Kč; Orders from 599 Kč to 799 Kč - 59 Kč; Orders from 799 Kč - FREE. Zásilkovna Z-BOX (up to 15kg): Orders from 299 Kč to 598 Kč - 49 Kč; Orders from 599 Kč to 799 Kč - 39 Kč; Orders from 799 Kč - FREE.
PARCEL_LOCKERS.cod_surcharge: Not available for Zásilkovna (Z-BOX). Not explicitly mentioned for AlzaBox/PPL Parcelbox.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Zoohit.cz provides home delivery, parcel shop delivery, and parcel locker delivery. In-store pickup is not available.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by Česká pošta and PPL. Pickup points and lockers are operated by PPL (Parcelshop, Parcelbox), Zásilkovna (Pickup Points, Z-BOX), and AlzaBox.
PRICING: Shipping is free for all orders over 799 Kč. For orders below this threshold, prices range from 39 Kč to 79 Kč, depending on the chosen service and order value. A minimum order value of 299 Kč applies. Cash on delivery (COD) is available for home delivery with a 39 Kč surcharge but is not an option for Zásilkovna services.
RESTRICTIONS: Standard packages are limited to 31 kg. Heavier orders are split into multiple parcels and may incur an unspecified service fee. Zásilkovna services are limited to packages up to 15 kg. The choice of carrier is not guaranteed and may be changed by zoohit for logistical reasons.
NOTABLE FEATURES: AlzaBox and PPL Parcelbox lockers offer 24/7 access for package pickup.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented in a tabbed format, detailing pricing tiers for different services. However, information regarding delivery timeframes and the specific cost of the service fee for overweight shipments is not provided in the visible content.
